title: Public Water Systems; Maximum Contaminant Levels; Monitoring Requirements; Notifications Required

State Regulations
§ 5-1.50 - Applicability and responsibility
§ 5-1.51 - Maximum contaminant levels, maximum residual disinfectant levels and treatment technique requirements
§ 5-1.52 - Tables
§ 5-1.55 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
